biotools.summary: Automatic Molecular Mechanics Optimization for in silico Screening 2. Efficient computational refinement of protein–small organic molecule complexes. Employs atomic-level energy minimization of a large number of experimental or modeled protein–ligand complexes.

bioschemas.name: AMMOS
